summary: This document is an invoice from J Epstein & Co Inc dated December 25, 2000, detailing transportation and duty charges amounting to $185.60. It includes references to various individuals and addresses related to the shipment and payment details.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 25, 2000, and details charges totaling $185.60.
The invoice references a shipment that was sent on December 19, 2000.
John Alessi is identified as the shipper associated with the transaction.
Pamela Roulet, Karin Models, and Dave North are mentioned as customers or recipients in the invoice.
The document includes various charges related to transportation and customs duties.
